conversation.message:
Thank you for your kind words, Parent_C. We are thrilled you are considering us seriously. Your child is high on our priority list as well.

Regarding early literacy and numeracy, we utilize a project-based learning approach. For literacy, we focus on phonological awareness through interactive storytelling and structured play (e.g., sound games and visual word recognition). For numeracy, we embed mathematical concepts—like sorting, patterning, and basic measurement—into daily activities and hands-on explorations, rather than rote memorization. Our goal is conceptual understanding and joyful engagement. We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome your child into our community.
